articles.description: Walmart hosted its first mass vaccine clinic in Springfield, offering the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine by appointment only.  And it is just a start.
articles.content:
SPRINGFIELD, Mo. (KY3) - Walmart hosted its first mass COVID-19 vaccine clinic in Springfield, offering the Pfizer COVID-19 by appointment only. And it is just a start.

articles.title: Walgreens vaccine slots fill up for Vermonters - WCAX
articles.description: As of Friday morning, the Walgreens website says there aren’t any more available appointments, at least for the next two days.
articles.content:
BURLINGTON, Vt. (WCAX) - Walgreens has fixed its website after a technical problem on Thursday prevented Vermonters 65 and older from registering for COVID vaccinations.

articles.author: Kate Kelland
articles.title: Debilitating 'long-COVID' may have severe health, social impacts: WHO - Reuters
articles.description: Thousands of COVID-19 patients continue to suffer serious, debilitating and lingering symptoms many months after their initial bout of infection, with major social, health and economic consequences, European health experts said on Thursday.
articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) - Thousands of COVID-19 patients continue to suffer serious, debilitating and lingering symptoms many months after their initial bout of infection, with major social, health and econ… [+1744 chars]

articles.title: GSK' Covid-19 drug falls short in trial, but may benefit older patients - STAT
articles.description: Patients older than 70 were more likely to be free of respiratory failure, a result that GSK plans to test in a new cohort of the study.
articles.content:
An experimental rheumatoid arthritis drug being developed by GlaxoSmithKline failed to show a significant benefit in hospitalized patients with Covid-19, the drug maker said Thursday.

articles.title: ‘It tastes like candy’: 105-year-old woman beats COVID-19 on gin-soaked raisin diet - FOX 10 News Phoenix
articles.description: Lucia DeClerck credits prayer for surviving the coronavirus at 105 years old, but she also pointed out she has a diet of raisins soaked in gin.
articles.content:
LITTLE EGG HARBOR TOWNSHIP, N.J. - Lucia DeClerck never thought she would survive COVID-19 and live 105 years on earth, but she credits her spiritual life — and her diet — to her longevity.
